alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 1:02PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mobile and west central Baldwin Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 102 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over I65 And AL 158, or over Chickasaw, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Saraland, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Creola, Axis, I65 And I165 and I65 And AL 158. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland
